question: How can I improve my flexibility to perform a perfect split in 30 days?

steps.content: How can I improve my flexibility to perform a perfect split in 30 days?
Plan: 1) Search for a 30-day flexibility routine for splits. 2) Summarize the key exercises and tips. 3) Provide the answer.
Searching for a 30-day flexibility routine to achieve a perfect split.
Found several routines focusing on daily stretching exercises targeting hamstrings, hip flexors, and groin muscles. Emphasizes consistency and gradual progression.
To improve flexibility for a perfect split in 30 days, follow a daily stretching routine focusing on hamstrings, hip flexors, and groin muscles. Consistency and gradual progression are key.

true_answer: To improve flexibility for a perfect split in 30 days, follow a daily stretching routine focusing on hamstrings, hip flexors, and groin muscles. Consistency and gradual progression are key.
